content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home one night from my girlfriends home, i had just crossed the black river bridge on rt. 41, up ahead i could see strange lights flashing in the sky. the lights where orange in color, and rectangular in shape. the night sky was cloudless, and crisp, allowing me to see clearly the stars and moon. the moon shone bright, causing the sky to appear a deep shade of purple. i pulled my car off to the side of the road and stepped out, to get a better view of the lights. the lights seemed to flash in patterns, (see attachment), every time they flashed the pattern changed. it seemed to me that the lights were signaling or giving out a code of some sort. the more i observed the the lights i could make out a outline in the sky, then i could see that these light were coming from a huge, circular object in the sky. my feeling went from curiosity to excitement and wonderment. then from nowhere, i felt like something was watching me, i was scared to move, but at the same time waves of peace and a sense to relax, were also present in my body. needless to say, i had an array of mixed emotions in just a series of minutes. i decided i just needed to leave, the emotions and sense of being watched alone made me feel uneasy. i got into my car and drove off, still keeping an eye to the skies. about 1/4 of a mile i lost sight of it.

i know what i saw was a ufo, something not from this world. i have always been tuned into the supernatural, and seen and heard things i can and cannot explain. even so much as had dreams that are unexplainable, dreams of tall dark figures, and such. this i cannot explain, but for some reason the events of that night and the details seem fresh in my mind.
content.summary: The ufo appeared to be isolated in the sky, circular in shape, and flashing rectangular, orange colored lights in a weird pattern.

content.detailedDescription: I lived approximately 0.5 miles from the restaraunt i worked at, i was 16 years old when this event took place. (note: i lived very close to the airport, and it was normal to see low flying planes and jets. on my way home from work that night, i was almost half way home, when i noticed a plane coming in on a normal approach pattern to the airport, it was a cool, crisp fall night, you could actually hear the leaves blowing across the street. but it hit me that this was not a plane or jet, it just looked peculiar to me ! and i stopped and watched in amazement, because it made no sound what soever, the next thing i knew it was hovering right above me ! i was not scared, i was mesmerized by it, i was trying to estimate it's size, but i couldn't, because i did not know what it was, but it's metal shimmered from it;s lights, not like anything iv'e seen before. then, just in a flash, it was gone, what seemed to me just a few minutes, turned into more, when i got home i saw the clock, and asked my parents who were watching tv, if the clock was right, and they told me it was. i could not account for, about 30 minutes of time, i did not mention this event to anybody. i was in shock and awe about this event, for years, it doesn't make sense to me, to this very day, but several years passed, when their was a local ufo investigation, from a local station, they interviewed the air traffic control tower personnel, the control tower person they interviewed had been there for twenty years. they asked him if he had ever seen anything peculiar on radar, he said yes, and what he described he saw on his radar screen, exactly fits to my incident, how it moved from one place to another, and then vanished.
content.summary: Was walking home from work, when i noticed, what appeared to be a plane coming in to land at cvg  airport.

content.detailedDescription: My mother and i were walking westward on sw 68th street, approaching sw 75th avenue at about 8:15pm.  we kept out eyes on the sky due to the leonid meteor shower scheduled to happen throughout the week and reaching its peak on the night of the 17th. but in the direction opposite to where the meteors were expected to pass, we noticed to very bright star-like objects moving north-north-west parallel to each other.  they were blinking vividly and plusatingly and in unison across the sky and moving quite fast in a straight line.  at first we assumed they were gps or telecom satellites because they were definitely artificial. but they were not moving in the direction in which satellites are supposed to move, nor are two satellites usually seen simultaneously. nor do satellites blink.  these observations were noted later, once we arrived back home from our walk.  i am still very curious as to what they were though i still want to believe that they are of earthly origin.  we lost sight of them once they flew over the horizon (near the palmetto expressway/sr-826).  we also noticed that there were several commercial aircraft in the area with which to compare: several airplaines landing and taking off from nearby miami international and tamiami airports, and a medevac helicopter.
content.summary: Two vividly blinking star-like objects traveling north-north-west in parallel formation

content.detailedDescription: I'm a truck driver in north dallas texas area for the most part.I was doin a nignt run from mesquite to coppell texas and back all night.I was 2 hours into my shift east bound on i-635 back to mesqiute.Just entered garland in medium heavy traffic at 22o5 huors{10:05 pm} i see some blue and red lights about maybe as far as a mile to a mile and a half away,their comin down rite over the freeway up ahead and leveling off just above traffic and heading west toward me. i'm thinking what the heck,thats in the air and their red and blue and looks like their following each other in formation like three or four military helicopters but these light are solid and not flashing and red and blue,no green,red and white.The blue light's are on my left and red on the right.Traveling in what appeares to be in pairs of blue and red like one unit with two light's each,three or four separate vehicle or aircraft.Each pair was closer to each other than the space between each pair. all with perfect eaqual spacing among them selves.They keep coming my way just following the interstate like a roadmap moving prety dam quick.These light are hugging the freeway and all these other people on the road gotta be seeing this too. they kept comeing and flew rite over me,i looked up and out my wind shield as they passed directly over me.There was a lot of city roadway lighting and i could not see any actual craft,just light's,red and blue solid ,no flashing and fairly large.Like volckswagon beetle size, no helicopter rotor noise.No jet engine noise.Just these cool looking, briliantly rich, red and blue light's.They had to be on some kind of craft but i couldn't make out any silowette or anything. they just zipped rite on by and they cruised off down the road in between at least three airport raidar systems in the area that i know of. addison airport,love field/dallas and dfw.Some one had to see this besides me.They were prety darn low though so maybe they didn't show up on raidar.I don't know how to find out.The ball is in your court now mufon.This was to much to ever hope for in my life time. wow!!!!!!
content.summary: Blue and red lights in formation traveling low,fast directly over interstate toward me

content.detailedDescription:
i am sorry i cannot report seeing any type of vehicle,and i have had a close-up view of an unknown vehicle,that was in 1973, ever since then i've kept an eye out for strange aerial phenomena,and i do keep up with ufo news,but i do not report every light in the sky that i think looks strange.  here's what i saw yesterday, a pillar of light standing vertically due west of roan mountain,tn. it was instantly striking because it was right out my back door,where i let my dog out every morning always about 10 'till 5,so i can get up in time to watch shepherd's chapel bible studies on tv. i will keep looking, it was too foggy to see anything this morning,maybe tomorrow. the thing looked as if someone had an airport spotlight shining straight up, but it ended abruptly,  about 75 to 100 yards up and you could not tell if it was beaming upwards or down, just a standing pillar of light in the middle of nowhere. it didn't look like bear hunters. i cannot figure it out. it looked similar to the tail of a comet,but i've never seen a comet that large or bright. i will keep looking and report any future sighting of this object if it is seen here again. thank you,  
*(wit's name deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: A shaft of light standing vertically where no lights have been seen in mountains for 30 years.

content.detailedDescription:
The attached color jpeg shows an intriguing, round, energy-emitting object over macy's geary st. store at union square, in downtown san francisco.  i was doing a night-photography exercise with a canon 5d on tripod, at 50 iso.

during the shoot, the sky over macy's was very dark, and the object in question was not visible to the naked eye.  later on during post-production of the shot, i selected or isolated the dark sky over macy's roof and applied to it a 12x exposure increase (or approximately three-and-a-half stops) in order to bring out colors and signals hidden in the shadows; at that exposure-increase point, the cyan, blue, dark-blue and violet colors seen showed up... at the same time with the object.

details of the mysterious element can be better appreciated on the second jpeg.  notice that it does not produce colors, only shades of gray.

i refuse to conjecture on what this is, but i am certainly mystified and puzzled by it.

���got any sensible theories as to the nature of this object?
content.summary: Ufo in san francisco

content.detailedDescription: This seems very similar case 26638 in flagstaff, az the same time period and day. the object was north of the big dipper when i was looking at it at 8pm in eastern sky. it looked like it was blinking red and blue but looked different than any other star that was blinking. i first saw this at about 8pm in the eastern sky. i went outside to look again at 2am and it was still in the same spot in relation to the big dipper and was now almost straight over my house. i saw a lot of lights (maybe 1 every 5 seconds) headed very fast toward the object they looked like smaller stars with a golden hue. these were not meteors.
content.summary: Blinking object by big dipper never seen before

content.detailedDescription:
The ufo event described below occurred during the time immediately following the september 11, 2001 attacks on the world trade center, when only military aircraft were allowed in us airspace.

it was late afternoon, i was alone in my truck on my way home from work. i was stopped at a traffic signal, about a mile from home, when i noticed a plane flying in a south eastwardly direction. air traffic is not unusual in my area, but this was the immediate post 911 time frame and only military aircraft were flying, so i took note and watched the jet as i waited for the traffic light to turn green. suddenly, three tri-angle shaped flying objects appeared at the rear of the plane. i can���������t say exactly which direction they came from because i was looking at the plane, but they seemed to come out of the east, at an altitude lower than that of the plane. the objects were grouped in a tri-angular formation, i thought for a moment there might be only one object, but because the sky was visible through the center of the grouping, i realize there were actually three separate flying objects. as they follow behind the military jet, they move up, down and left to right in unison and then hovered motionless for a few seconds. the three aircraft then followed directly behind the plane for a few more seconds before they dropped in altitude and shot off to the east so rapidly, that they vanished in a matter of a couple seconds. gone! 
continuing on my way home, i realized that i had witnessed a ufo sighting. i wondered what it was all about. what were the ufo���������s looking for? were they protecting our airspace? were they working with our military? all questions i knew would never be answered.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Three triangle shaped objects following behind military aircraft

content.detailedDescription: Okay, so im walking down the street at about 6:30pm. the night was dark enough to see the stars so i looked around. ahead of me was a birght star that seemed to be very close. i thought to myself, "huh, i've never seen that star before." i watched it for a few seconds, and then it disappeared. my jaw dropped. 'no way!' iwas in shock. and then it came back, and i felt a rush of adrenelin. oh my god. i will never forget what happened. it flashed about 4 more times, and then i think it started to tavel south. while it was moving, it started to blink. it soon became out of sight not soon after.
content.summary: The star was blinking

content.detailedDescription:
a string of orbs over san francisco caught on video tape! this is not the first time i have seen these type of things. i also have videos of other strings or ribbons of orbs flying over head just a few day prior.

in my backyard i was looking up and noticed a long string of white orbs. it was night time and i first thought it was a series of helium balloons that got free. but after closer inspection, i realized these were not balloons. the shape was different, they were lit up and although flying together, the orbs were free to move around (as not connected). the thing moved slowly northward then eastward then ne then east again. it was about 200 feet up. the orbs did not have a balloon shape but were perfectly round and emitted a white light from within. also, the orbs did not stay in place, they moved to other positions in this string pattern. they were free to move about each other yet they stayed pretty much in this string pattern.  i was lucky to have my new "ir video camera" and captured them flying over my house for a minute or so. please see video. i will also post the video on you tube under my site ufoandusohunter. 

hope for clear skies and more sightings.
*(wit's first name and other information deleted--cms/sg)
content.summary: 16 bright white orbs flying over house. orbs shifting positions as changing directions

content.detailedDescription:
I am a 42-year old male with a recent marital separation and displacement from my home. i am currently living at my parents home while searching for another place. i mention this to provide an indication of my current mental state of being at the time of this sighting. it seems all in my life has gone horribly wrong, and at the time of the sighting, i was in the process of speaking a rather angry prayer to the judeo-hebraic god yhwh, in whom i believe. at the time, i was casting blame toward him for my recent state of affairs. 

i had just endured a bitter argument which actually caused some suicidal thoughts for a few moments, but i recovered relatively quickly. i went outdoors behind the house and entered into a state of prayer while looking up at the sky.  during the prayer, i was facing due north of scottsbluff and was staring at a elongated dark nimbostatus cloud. 

i was angrily praying that i didn't understand what the purpose was for my being born, when god has permitted nothing to happen in my life that is successful. when i had uttered "i loath the day i was born and don't understand why you would put me here to get nowhere in this world, and i don't even know why i bother to speak to you when it always seems to fall on deaf ears",  i saw a bright star-like object descend from the cloud at which i had been staring. 

at first the object appeared to descend at a rapid rate. i thought it could simply be an aluminum-coated party balloon being blown about by winds, while reflecting the sunlight since it was only about 3:40 pm mst and the sun was at a 45-degree westerly position from the objects position in the north. the balloon theory quickly vaporized as the object became quite active. 

the object increased in brilliance and jolted approximately 10 to 20 miles to the left of its former location, within a period of half a second (estimated based on the perceived altitude of the object in relation to ground miles per inch moved from perspective).  the object came to an abrupt halt, then shot to the right and past the position where it had begun. it then moved 5 to 10 miles to the right of its starting position within less than one second once again and came to a complete halt. 

the object returned to its starting point and then ascended above the cloud for about 15 to 20 seconds. as the clouds moved away to reveal the object again, it began moving up and down rapidly, about 20 to 30 times with enough speed that it appeared to draw a diagonal line of light in the sky. it came to a stop and then began flying in a round circular pattern, performing 6 complete circles. 

the object then ascended and moved back above the cloud and remained out of sight for another 10 seconds, then it began to slowly descend below the cloud where it came into view again, then went back up above the cloud. this ascending and descending occurred 3 times. on the third time of ascension, the ordeal was over and the object wasn't seen again. 

considering i was angrily praying when the object occurred, i was quite stunned and fear-stricken. while i'm not absolutely sure this sighting had anything to do with my angry prayer at the time, it seems to be more than a mere coincidence to me, giving me the "feeling" that "something" was observing the commotion i was making, since i was speaking toward the sky out loud. 

i remembered the last utterance i had made before this object of brilliance appeared and i gave in to awe at first as prayer turned into a very silent period of observation of the object. once it had concealed itself not to be seen again, the awe turned into a rapid heartbeat and a sense of fear as i finally was able to move - at which time i went back into the house and mentally repeated what i had seen over and over again for nearly 3 hours after. 

i realize many of scientific mind may want to gain a deeper insight into how the mental/spiritual state of people may be influencing at least some of these sightings, and i have provided mine openly so others may take these things into account. i am concealing the information that led up to my marital woes, and the names of my family members for privacy reasons. however, i believe the "mental climate" i was experiencing at the time of the observance may play a very important role in why i saw this "thing" whether demonic, angelic, or other-worldly alien. 

i can tell you this much, however. no human being could survive the abrupt stops, or the rapid changes in altitude this thing made. i also feel i wasn't alone in the sighting, as all of the neighborhood dogs were barking ecstatically the entire time i observed the object. once it ascended above the clouds, the dogs continued barking for about 3 minutes after it wasn't seen visually again. 

this was a very, very creepy and unsettling event for me, and one i hope i never have to endure again.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Brilliant star-like object with abrupt movements left and right, then circular flight maneuvers, changing altitude

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my hot tub with my husband facing north west when out of the corner of my eye to the right a large flaming ball with a long tail moving really fast, shot in front of us.  it was  a lot faster than a airplane, because we used their speed to compare.  there were at least two planes in the area, because we have bwi nearby.  it shot very straight towards the northwest.  it was 20 times bigger than any star in the sky. really amazing, not a shooting star.
content.summary: Very big red flaming  ball with a long tail

content.detailedDescription:
I took a picture of a plane above my house.Altitude was 8000 - 10000 feet.
when i looked at the picture on my computer a saw this orb above the plane.


-time on the picture is 1 hour off. forgot to change to winter time.-
content.summary: Unknown orb next to an airplane

content.detailedDescription:
Watching from patio, looking at moon, no real reason..Just havin a smoke on my patio.
looking south and up.
object high, 4 red lights two ad back as if on ends of a tringle, two near front/center of a triagle shape.
observed other planes in the area at same time, all with white lights, red lights, strobes, normal airplane config.  some very near and low, some far away and high...All normal with strobes...
what i saw had zero strobes at all...None.  i watched it pass eastward, and lost sight, went out front door, to get a better view of eastern sky, lost it....Should have been able to pick it back up, but gone.
content.summary: High, dull red lights, no strobes at all.

content.detailedDescription:
My family and i live in a rural area off of hwy 270 near a heavily wooded area. this event happened in the northern sky which from my backyard is directly facing a hill.
i was outside grilling hamburgers at night and was almost finished when i decided to sit on my porch steps for the last 5 minutes or so and look at the sky. it was very clear that night and the stars had recently began appearing. i looked up and noticed a light that seemed brighter than any other planet or star should and did not put off the typical light a common aircraft would. the light had a blue tint to it and seemed to be more of a glow. it was roughly the same altitude as any plane would fly in the area but i noticed that i wasn't hearing any noise from it at all. i continued to watch it move eastward for about another minute and also found it weird that there were no flashing lights like airplanes have. so i opened my back door and grabbed a pair of binoculars that i keep next to our kitchen window and went back outside to my porch. i spotted the object again still moving in the same direction and focused in on it. it appeared almost ball-like and the light was eminating out of about 2/3 of the top towards the back of the craft at a upwards angle. (think of holding a flashlight at a 45 degree angle pointing up)
at this point i noticed that i was correct that it was missing the clearance lights (or whatever those flashing ligthts are called) and i wanted to adjust my binoculars a bit so i took them down. after fixing them i spotted it again. it hadn't moved very far at all and was about the same size in the sky as previously. probably took about ten-fifteen seconds to adjust lenses. but when i tried to find it in my binoculars i couldn't. once again i lowered them, and found it with my eyes, tried to put the binoculars back on it and couldn't. i looked through them for about 10 seconds and when i took them down again the object was gone.
it wasn't that it had traveled so far that it became too small to see. it had simply dissappeared. i felt really excited about it and at this point i went inside and told my wife what i had just saw.
content.summary: Bluish glowing object sighted in northern sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home - going east.  there is much air traffic in our sky so i see flashing lights all the time and know the different airplane lights (we are on the flight path of midway airport & a local airport). i noticed these lights because they were strobing.  then i saw the outline of the craft.  it was large & triangular & looked almost like it was tipped to the side slightly.  i pulled into my driveway about a minute after spotting the object.  i ran inside to get my camera and when i got back outside i could still see the lights but it was too far away to the east to record.  i then noticed a single strobing light not as far east.  this light went almost due south.  it met up with another light & they both continued southward.  i watched until i couldn't see them anymore.
content.summary: Floating triangle shape with reddish flashing lights at the corners moving east. 2 small strobing lights travelled to the south at the same time

content.detailedDescription: This sounds crazy i know! the weirdest thing happened i go running about 4 times a week i run to the top of a mountain and pray. well i noticed an object in the sky a red light very fast i thought it was a comet until it stopped above me and started getting closer. i closed my eyes for maybe 3 seconds and when i opened them i was shocked there someone was in front of me. i thought it may be someone else out hiking or something he looked normal so i asked him does he see that. he told me he came out of it i laughed thinking he was joking. he told me he needed my help with something that only i could help him with i told him he was crazy. i told him aliens don't exist but he didn't call himself an alien he called himself something else at first he wasn't even speaking in english. he asked me what did he have to do to prove he was an alien i was joking and said make fire come out of your hands i didn't think it was possible i must be going crazy because i swear i seen fire. i screamed he grabbed my mouth and said i'm not here to  hurt you i need your help.Being afraid i asked him what was it he needed,he told me some crazy story about him and his brother and that i knew where his brother was and where his brothers spear was. it is crazy but i had a dream about his brother before but i don't know him just the name. before he could finish talking to me something else came out of the forest except it didn't look like us it was pale skinned, no hair, great athletic condition,eyes so dark i have never seen that color black before it wasn't very tall either maybe 4.5ft maximum. they started fighting the next thing i know i'm knocked down and when i raise up there both gone. the one that i first talked to though didn't look nothing like the other it looked like us and it had a sword that when it hit a tree as he swung at the other and it fell over it went straight threw. there is more but to much to go over here i think i may be going crazy. please one of you that work here please contact me and tell me i am going crazy. i am very afraid.
content.summary: I not only seen the ship he talked to me.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside washing my car talking to my neighbor, i looked towards the moon, still daylight though, and noticed this small cone shaped object. i seen that it slowly moved left to right, then up and down, maintaining the same speed through out, no sound. i asked my neighbor "what is that". he noticed it as well. he didnt pay too much attention to it, he resumed talking to me. i would look up every so often and it was still there. im not sure how high it was, but it seemed like a long ways away, and it seemed big from the distance. i looked up one last time and didnt see it anymore. i reported the sighting to the mufon in nc. i just listened to the mufon trafic report with roger marsh, and he mentioned another witness in nc that seen something similar. different dates for the sighting, but im sure the same object from the description.
content.summary: Black, cone shaped, no lights, big

content.detailedDescription:
It was approximately 8:35 am, and i was out on my morning walk during my first break at work.  since a storm is moving in today, i looked up to check for clouds, and saw a strange object heading over the sierra foothills.  thinking it might be a large jet, maybe even an air bus, i looked at it closer, and realized there was something strange about it.  

i see planes on a daily basis, from the size of personal twin engine type, all the way to huge cargo planes.  i work in rancho cordova, ca, which is directly under the flight path from sacramento international airport to the east, and within 3 or 4 miles of mather (a former air force base), that still receives cargo planes for various shipping companies, along with fighter jets for the popular air shows.  

no, what i saw today was nothing like a plane or a jet.  for instance, with a plane or jet, you can always make out the wings, but this object had none.  it was bright white, and looked segmented (long white section, then a small grey section, white section, grey section, long white section), kind of like a centipede), and it flew in a straight line.  when i first sighted the object, it was already pretty far away, and yet in the sky it was the size of a dime (which makes me estimate it was at least the size of a football field).  and it was traveling at a high rate of speed.  in no more than 5 seconds the object was completely gone.
content.summary: White segmented, cigar shaped object seen between rancho cordova and sierra foothils

content.detailedDescription:
I had entered the 101 freeway headed east from the 7th street on ramp.  just north of the freeway at that location is the deer valley airport.  as i drove past the cave creek road exit on the 101 headed east, because traffic was moving kind of slow i was watching out the window of my vehicle to the north, i saw what at first appeared to be what i perceived as a small light aircraft white in color which was also headed in easterly direction that seemed low in the sky and maybe 1/4 mile north of the freeway which is to say relatively close.

because the aircraft was quite apparently in my field of view from the driver window position i proceeded to roll down the window on my vehicle so i could see it better and traffic was moving slowly along as it often does in this area during the morning drive time.  when i rolled down my window i could see quite clearly that the object had no wings and was a bright white color with no other markings.  at this time my thought was that the object looked a lot like one of those military drones because it seemed to be pretty close to the freeway yet not exceptionally large like a small airplane might be at that distance.

the object was traveling in easterly direction in a stable flight path and seemed to be slowing somewhat although it could well have been that i was beginning to pick up speed in my vehicle as traffic was beginning to move a little faster.  i felt that i had that chance then to observe the aircraft as closely as i could before resuming normal freeway speeds.  i could see that the object had a cigar shaped front end which had led me to the idea that it was a military drone because they sometimes have that cockpit area that is enlarged.  i noticed then that the object also had a cigar shaped rear shape and was basically a cigar shaped cylinder.  

as i was observing the craft i kept asking myself to try to determine how far away it was because as i looked closely, although the object appeared to be quite close the edges all around it looked blurry so it made it hard to tell if it was a bigger object far away, or a smaller object nearer by. i was then ready to stop watching the craft because i needed to pay attention to my driving as traffic speed was picking up.  as i looked at it as best i could, it disappeared.  i searched the sky all around and couldn't believe that it was gone in an instant like that.  i was looking right at it when it disappeared.

as i continued to my morning destination, it annoyed and kind of even angered me a little inside because i kept asking myself if i had a perception problem with what i had observed, or had i seen something unique.  it also made me feel that way because there was a lot of traffic and people driving where i was located that could easily have seen it and i wondered if others had seen it too but i had no way of knowing.  

several months ago i saw a similar object in the sky in this area just east of deer valley airport.  the craft was further away and was moving in and out of the hills there.  this is an area of approach to the airport and the reason i noticed the object then was because of that very thing, that the object was not flying in a normal approach type pattern.  

i am reporting this because of my hope that others will come forward if they have seen something like this in this area.  when i told some friends what i had seen it felt to me that the words i was using to describe it just sounded ridiculous and trite and i felt like i must have sounded like some kind of idiot.  it bothers me to feel like that because i saw what i saw.  it was not a completely mind blowing extraordinary thing to see yet to me it was something quite unusual and difficult to explain from my own perception, much less trying to explain to others. 

could i have been seeing something totally explainable?  sure.  could i maybe not have that good of eyesight since i am getting older?  sure.  i personally don't believe that is the case but i don't want to feel like some kind of idiot so i am gonna hit send and report it. i hope you do the same if you have seen things in this area of north phoenix.
content.summary: Bright white cigar shaped object in north phoenix

content.detailedDescription: It was the 4th of july. i was 10,11,or 12. we were all out in the parkinglot watching everyone light their fireworks off. we lived in woodland square apartment coop. on starlight st. in pontiac. next to the only virgin wooded area left in that city. over the trees it came. i saw it floating there. so close. i remember pointing and saying "look!!! look!!!" everyone that was there saw it. there were alot of people. we all looked at it in awe! it was silent. it came closer. it was maybe 40 or 50 feet in the air when i first noticed it coming over the trees. closer and closer. it was silent. i want to say it had lights. it wasnt so dark that you couldnt plainly see what it was. after a while my mother went into our appartment to call whatever authority she thought would tell her what it was. i remember it coming but i dont remember it leaving. after it happened i dont remember making a fuss about it the next day or anything. it just seemed to not have happened. later in life i asked a boy who was my best friend at the time if he remembered the incident. and he seemed upset with me and answered quite sternly "it was a blimp!!! it said happy 4th of july on the side of it!!!" he seemed very angry with me for asking him to recall the incident. i asked my mother this year if she remembered it. she said she didnt. i asked her to try really hard to remember and she said that she did remember going into the house to call the police who told her that it was a hellicoptor. those are the only people i remember from back then that were there. im absolutely sure it wasnt either of those things. i know what i saw. i remember it coming clearly. i just dont remember it leaving. ive never known any blimps to fly close to the ground on the 4th of july when morters are exploding in the sky. and i absolutely know with everything in my being that it was not a helicoptor. it was so close. maybe 100 200 feet away. i really want to be hypnotized to remember everything. i know some of the event and others i remember small parts of are missing. mary zimmer helped a friend of mine remember and he is feeling much better. i would love it if she could help me. im desperate. not knowing consumes me sometimes. i just want to know. im not scared. i just want the walls in my mind to be taken down. its in there i know it is. i really want to remember.Ive had many "dreams" about ships and them.
content.summary: Kind of disk shaped but not skinny. not quite as tall as wide. smooth edges. i want to say it had lights under. i want to say red. its still fuzzy. maybe 30 or so feet wide. not really huge at all.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside around 6:30 pm on november 14, 2010. i was looking at the moon and jupiter as it was clearly visible. i looked the east was watching the planes that fly over from down south. they go by every 2 or 3 minutes. inbetween planes, i saw a light traveling in the same path. i thought it might be a plane at a higher altitude, except it had no wing markers on it. and it was traveling extremely fast. then it almost came to a complete stop instantly, but not quite stopped. then it made a 90 degree turn to the east and accelerated to an incredible speed in one second. as it increased speed, it appeared to grow in size and looked distorted for a fraction of a second. then the object vanished and the distortion then vanished. two seconds later i saw another light following the same path in the same area of sky. and it just increased speed and went out of veiw over the trees to the north. again there were no flashing lights or markers on second object. the entire event lasted between 15 and 18 seconds. 

my feelings during this event were that this was not a conventional aircraft or any kind of craft known. the sudden 90 degree turn, incredible speed and its departure startled me considerably. i know of nothing that can move this fast or make a turn at such a speed.
content.summary: Circular in shape and brightly lit

content.detailedDescription: I was picking up a load of crude oil from a lease 3 miles southwest of the williams community.Upon arriving at the lease i spotted a light hoovering above a nearby field.It had oddly spaced lights that were moving right to left.When one would start to disappear to the right i could see the other starting to reappear to the left.It gave the impression that it was disk shaped and had rotation.There was only one light at a time in clear view as the the second was always disappearing as the next one was coming into view on the opposite side.I grabbed my phone to get a picture.Before i could get the shot the craft gave the impression that it went from a horizontal position to a tilted one and just as i was fixing to take the picture it simply vanished or the lighted aspects of the craft went dark.There were no streaks of light as it disappeared.Just the total absense of any lights.It made no noise and wasnt moving in any direction other then when the object tilted and a distinctive rotation of the visable lights.I observed the object through the windshield of my truck and from the outside of the door as i was trying to get the shot.It gave the impression it was aware that i had grabbed my phone.Things happen quickly as soon as i picked it up.I was very disapointed i couldnt get the shot.
content.summary: Lighted disc shaped object with rotation spotted 150 ft. above field.

content.detailedDescription:
I had a errie psyonic feeling in the air, i was 'feeling my place in the cosmos' and feeling out my life and what the future brings.

i had spent the night researching on the internet the ufo phenomenon and became convinced that they watch us constantly and that my previous negative experiences with the super-natural had to do with my cosmic identity and that i couldn't escape dealing with the painful and strange side of life.

while walking my dog i really felt like i must have been sending out psyonic distress signals.  after i saw it i tried to send it something to let them know that i was okay.

the event could have been a natural phenomenon however i feel fairly studied in the observation of nature and the night sky and can't think of what it would be.  that coupled with my convictions about the nature of consciousness and its roll in the universe (my initial angle on this being from direct negative experiences, many years ago) i do beleive it was super-natural.

what happened:

i looked up, after catching 'something' out of the corner of my eye, maybe a flash.  then i saw what appeared very clearly to be a comet in the sky.  sitting there with a tail and white streek behind it, the tail was also blue,  i know that comets move very slow so i was at first astonished that i had not scene it before.  

within the same second of spotting this there was also a very long shooting star right to the right of me, about 30 degrees from my central field of view of 'the comet'.  in retrospect it looked like one of those really high flying shooting stars that is just a single-white-line except it seemed super low and close.  to my total surprise the 'comet' started to disintegrate... slowly... with this distinct blue gas lingering for a good 15 seconds.  

the shooting star is perhaps co-incidental, and maybe i witnessed some extreme and random collection of negative ions in the sky.  but i don't think so.  the lingering blue gas was an incredible sight.  i'd say the comet phenomenon was about 1 to 1/2 a degree of visible area in the sky.
it was distinctly 'blue gas' floating around and slowly dissipating.  initially with a bright light at its far right center.  

in retrospect it looked like it could have been a strobe light peering through a low lying cloud.  i tried to make out a ship in the general area there but i can't be sure, i did see weird-ness in that whole general area.
content.summary: Strange comet like fomation with lingering blue gas in the sky; way too short to be a comet, trail of low flying blue gas could not have been a meteor, distinct bright light sitting inside the blue gas.  under 1,000 feet. 3 am ft.Myers fl

content.detailedDescription:
1. where were you and what were you doing at the time?
 november 15, 2010 6:30 pm looking @ the moon.
 2. what made you first notice the object? 
 i glanced west, i saw out of the corner of my eye a object that was moving kinda jerky
3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?
 idk?
4. describe the object and its actions and motions.
disc that had a red/orangish -dim white light-made no sound, moving above the trees, following this object was a [very bright white object with a redlight -made no sound.], useing the same jerks or moves to keep up with it. the red/orangish object stayed on a very slow nw path-- but then the very bright white object stopped and hovered above the treeline for a few minutes.-- then it went and followed the red/orangish object. 
5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.
but the "weird" thing was... 5 disc like objects with red/orangish lights followed behind them.
6. how did you lose sight of the object?
 i couldn't see them any more because they were flyin nw.
content.summary: Red/orangish

content.detailedDescription: i see these moving stars every night and morning that its not cloudy..They just glide across the sky. faster than a plane would be alot slower than a falling star.Sometimes there 4 or 5 within 10 minutes time. no blinking lights like a plane would have.Except the ones that slowly strobe and stay out for a few seconds,those are usually amber colored. but as i was watching the third one i saw(just this morning) (looks like a star)gliding across the sky,not far from it and its path..I saw a bright blink,and this star slowed down.So i was looking where the blink was,and it was another one.It was going the other way.It was signaling the other one..That was the first time i saw that happen.There have been alot more lately (alot mro active).Sometimes they go straight, sometimes wobble,sometimes zig-zag.I have even seen them move to go around stars..These can not be airplanes..I was telling my sister about them a while back,she said call me next time you see one.I called her 5 minutes later and told her where to look,she freaked out when she spotted it.Then a few minutes later she called me back(she spotted another one). all u have to do is look up.I live across the river from the airport..They have radar.All i can say (they must be flying above radar). they do look higher than a plane would be..To all those who dont get it.Just look up maybe i should report them everytime. but that would be every night just about..Ya'll need a repeat button .Lol.I see that there is a guy in shreveport on youtube that records them (exactly the same thing i see). shreveport is in north louisiana,i live in south louisiana.
content.summary: What are these moving stars ?? every night / every morning..This morning was different..

content.detailedDescription:
I work the graveyard shift at the hospital in town, and i was sitting outside this morning on my break at 4:30am local time hoping to observe some of the leonid meteor shower. 

i only saw 4 meteor streaks when i was outside, so i kept moving my line of sight in order to see if a different direction would have better action. at 4:50am, i noticed a 'star' located in the vicinity of the big dipper (i don't have that much knowledge of star names and locations) that kept grabbing my attention, because it looked like it was 'twinkling', but the other stars nearest to it were not. this 'star' was very small, like the others nearby, so i'm guessing it was a great distance away, or just not noteworthy in size. flagstaff is a dark sky city, so light pollution is very minimal, and it's easy to see a wide range of stars. there were no clouds to block the view. 

i assumed it was a satalite at first, because of the size and the fact that it was wobbling a bit, but it wasn't following a path. it kept returning to, from what i could tell, what was the same spot (not sure at that distance.)it was the same color as the other stars, but it kept changing it's brightness, lasting a few seconds each time, right before it would move. it would move about it's spot like it was a pinball in a machine, very irradic. when it would move, the light would blur out a little from the object, and it would move fast, zig-zag, make 90 degree turns on a dime. the whole area this was taking place in could have easily been blocked out by my pinky finger nail. there were two stars nearest to this object, and they formed a scalene triangle with the object, but i believe this was a coincidence unrelated to the object. after the whole 30 minutes i stayed watching it, a nurse came outside and we chatted for no more than 5 minutes. when she left and i looked back at that spot in the sky, the object was barely noticable, but i had to get back to work. 

i know it was a meteor shower, but there's no way that was any meteor fragment. anyone else out there notice this?
content.summary: Very small, star-like object exhibiting odd movements

content.detailedDescription:
I was leaving my house to visit a friend at around 7;30 tonight 11/17/20.I was in my driveway about to get in my car, when my wife came out of the house with my cigarettes that i'd forgotten. when she brought them  out to me she pointed to the west and said "what is that"? we saw 2 fireballs coming towards us moving west to east. they flew directly over our house about 300 feet above us. they were in the shape of spheres that were on fire.  we could see that they were covered in flames. we got a good look at them and they were red  and yellow glowing fireball. they were moving horizontally together.  we watched the fireballs fly directly over the house and i told my wife to go get the camera! by the time she got back out they had traveled far enough that they were only the size of red dots . she zoomed in on them and snapped 4 pictures of them moving away from us. these fireballs didn't stop or slow down and were moving at a very fast speed with no sound. these objects were absolutely not planes, jets, balloons, blimps, hot air balloons, meteorites, but they were completely engulfed in flames. 
i know,more pictures of red lights in the sky we wish we would of had the camera when they flew over the house. i was spectacular! we couldn't believe how close they were to the ground. the camera used was an olympus fe360 2.5 pixels.
content.summary: Fireballs flew over my house

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were outside looking for shooting stars(while having a smoke) when i noticed what had looked like a plane approaching from the south.Bright light, but,high in the sky.As it was getting closer the light dimmed to where it looked like a moving star(no blinking lights,slow pace).Then, it turned a quick 35 degree angle to the east. as it went behind a high thin cloud, it disappeard, and i said to my wife ,"i bet it appears near that star,(pointing to a star where i thought it would appear)".And i was pretty close. by this time we were looking about dead east and as the light headed in the northeast direction i still didnt notice any blinking light and the brightness never faded or got stronger.About an hour later we went out to have another smoke and i noticed a small plane(looking east) going north to south and low(blinking light and could hear it) then i noticed the same light we saw an hour ago right above it moving the same direction(but it seemed like it was about the same altitude as before but going much faster). i looked at my wife and said,"its hauling ass now", and she agreed.When we looked back up it seemed like it had slowed down and we watched it for about 5 min until it was barely visible on the horizon.
content.summary: In a distance, looked like airplane headlights (brightness)but high in altitude

content.detailedDescription: I was driving west on 23rd street in independence just past noland road when i noticed a commercial jet flying at normal altitude from east to west and north of my location.  there was a large sphere that was glinting in the sun just like the plane was, it was above the plane and that is what i was watching - when all of a sudden i saw what looked like an electrical arc shoot from the spehere to the plane and stay there for a few seconds, then dissapear.  it is the strangest thing i've ever seen.  the plane kept going as if it was unaffected by the event, then the sphere moved quickly up and away and out of my sight.
content.summary: Electrical arc between jet and sperical object
